description:
King Enma is the big boss of the underworld, and he is also the one responsible for sending his nephew http://anidb.net/ch29099 [Enma] down to the human world as the leader of the Spirit Patrol. The reason he chose to send Enma was obviously because he was sure Enma could capture all the evil spirits living in the human world... right...?
Source: Official Site
name: Enma Daiou
